metadata.Description: Organizations that are part of the United Nations system and work on various global issues.

entities.Description: Markets where electricity, natural gas, and other energy commodities are bought and sold.
Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
Climate finance mechanisms refer to the various financial instruments and mechanisms that are used to mobilize and allocate funds for climate change mitigation and adaptation projects.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.
Organizations that focus on energy issues within a specific region.

relations.Description: UN agencies employ renewable energy experts to provide technical assistance and expertise in promoting sustainable energy practices.
relations.Subject: un agencies

relations.Description: UN agencies collaborate with civil society organizations to foster partnerships and promote sustainable energy initiatives at the grassroots level.
relations.Subject: un agencies

relations.Description: UN agencies support energy access programs to ensure that underserved communities have access to clean and affordable energy sources.
relations.Subject: un agencies

relations.Description: UN agencies administer climate finance to support sustainable energy projects and initiatives in developing countries.
relations.Subject: un agencies

relations.Description: UN agencies measure the energy efficiency performance of countries and provide recommendations for improvement.
relations.Subject: un agencies

relations.Description: UN agencies align their efforts in the sustainable energy sector with the Sustainable Development Goals to promote global sustainability.
relations.Subject: un agencies

relations.Description: UN agencies are an instance of international organizations that work towards promoting sustainable energy practices and addressing global challenges.
relations.Subject: un agencies
renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

relations.Subject: climate finance mechanisms
relations.Description: Climate finance mechanisms implement building standards that promote sustainable and energy-efficient construction practices.

relations.Subject: climate finance mechanisms
relations.Description: Climate finance mechanisms provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean and sustainable energy sources.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.

relations.Subject: regional energy organizations
relations.Description: Regional energy organizations implement energy efficiency policies to promote sustainable energy practices.

relations.Subject: regional energy organizations
relations.Description: Regional energy organizations focus on improving energy access in underserved areas to ensure equitable distribution of sustainable energy resources.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: energy storage
relations.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

relations.Subject: renewable energy certificates
relations.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.

relations.Subject: energy cooperatives
relations.Description: Energy cooperatives address energy poverty by providing affordable and sustainable energy solutions to underserved communities.
